name: Gujarat Kidney & Superspeciality Hospital
title: Gujarat Kidney & Superspeciality Hospital located at Vadodara is one of the top multi specialty hospitals in the state. At Gujarat Kidney & Superspeciality Hospital, we make effective use of the advanced technology for providing top notch treatment facility for our patients.

name: Rhythm Heart Institute
title: Rhythm Heart Institute has been a trusted and top tier name in cardiology care in Vadodara. Providing access to the State-of-Art diagnostic and treatment technologies is a hallmark of Rhythm Heart Institute.

name: Sursagar Multispeciality Hospital
title: Sursagar Multispeciality Hospital is a 41 bed hospital that is well-known for its patient-centric approach, advanced healthcare infrastructure and competent medical care.It provides the following services to their patients for a comprehensive and efficient healthcare experience: Blood Bank, Parking, Path Lab, Pharmacy, Prayer Room.

name: Unity Hospital
title: Unity Hospitals is one of the leading hospital with 50 beds in Vadodara. The best healthcare professionals provide Comprehensive healthcare. It is located at Gotri. It provides advanced levels of care in over different specialties including General Medicine.

name: Tricolour Hospital
title: Tricolour Hospital is a 129 bed hospital that is well-known for its patient-centric approach, advanced healthcare infrastructure and competent medical care.The hospital caters to several medical specialties, including Cardiology, Endocrinology, Oncology, Haematology, Neurology, Gastroenterology, Dentistry, Ophthalmology, Dermatology, ENT.

name: Sunshine Global Hospital
title: Sunshine Global Hospital contains 225 beds in Surat, Gujarat which was established in 2009. The chain of super specialty hospitals is NABH accredited and offers excellence in a variety of medical specialities.

name: Sanjivani Hospital
title: Sanjivani Hospital is a 15 bed hospital that is well-known for its patient-centric approach, advanced healthcare infrastructure and competent medical care.

name: Parul Sevasharam Hospital
title: Parul Sevasharam Hospital is a 200 bed hospital that is well-known for its patient-centric approach, advanced healthcare infrastructure and competent medical care.

name: Dhiraj Hospital
title: Dhiraj Hospital is a 200 bed hospital that is well-known for its patient-centric approach, advanced healthcare infrastructure and competent medical care.

name: Varun Children Hospital
title: Varun Children Hopspital is a very well known hospital for children in Vadodara. It is a 50 bed hospital that is well-known for its patient-centric approach, advanced healthcare infrastructure and competent medical care.

name: Metro Hospital
title: Metro is the most leading hospital in vadodara that treats patients with utmost care and provides the best facilities.

name: Sterling Hospital
title: Sterling Hospital, with state-of-the-art infrastructure and cutting-edge technology, has multiple beds with fully equipped intensive care units and modern operation theatres and offers treatment services in Radiation Oncology, Cardiac Sciences, Critical Care and Pulmonology, Gastroenterology and GI Surgery, Neurosciences and Spine Surgery, Nephrology and Urology, Orthopaedics and Joint Replacement, Obstetrics and Gynaecology etc.
